Title: Poof Your Way through Pubs (not the Irish ones)

ItemTooltips.blink:
If you need a better Positioning for Teamfights you can Poof in with all your Meepos at once.
Only recommended for experienced Meepo Players or high Micro skiled Players.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: Excellent start Items that increase your already high Base Armor and makes laning easier. Built into Ring of Basilius later on.
ItemTooltips.branches: Branches are always nice for some starting Stats.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_regen: Some Health Regen for better laning and built into Tranquil Boots later.
ItemTooltips.reaver: For more HP. Because auf the raw Strenght every Meepo gets more Hitpoints.
ItemTooltips.mekansm:
Only of no one else gets it.
Excellent choice if you need something cheaper as an Heart of Tarrasque to survive. You can Heal all your Meepos.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: The Aura affects every Meepo, so you get one Item with an Aura for 5. You also need this for an early Roshan and easier Jungle.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: Extra Mana Regen and Armor. All you need at your lane and for Vladimirs as core later.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: With this you get one extra Meepo and the Stats sharing of every Meepo increase from 30% to 100% ! So you get an unstopable Army of FIVE Meepos at Level 16.
ItemTooltips.assault:
If you have to handle high Armor Enemies or against Carries with high Pysical DPS.
The Aura affects all of your Meepos.
ItemTooltips.heart: If you need to survive more and get a hard time with Magic Damage get Heart of Tarrasque. All your Meepos benefits of it with an high HP Boost!
ItemTooltips.armlet: If you finish your Heart of Tarrasque get Armlet and you wont lose HP with it active. Boosts every of your Meepos.
ItemTooltips.ethereal_blade: If your Game running well and you need some more nuke Damage, Ethereal Blade is an axcellent Choice. You Poof Damage will raise very well with it.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: Makes jungling easier and you can heal every Meepo by himself with these Boots.

AbilityTooltips.meepo_earthbind: A Hard to Land spell that Roots Enemies in Place for 2 Seconds. With 4 Meepos you can root someone forever in one Place. As longer you throw your Net as longer it takes to hit your Enemies so take care of this.
AbilityTooltips.meepo_poof: With Poof you can travel with one Meepo the every other Meepo and also do a big AoE Damage with it. Nice as an Nuke aswell as an Escape Spell.
AbilityTooltips.meepo_geostrike: Passive that Slows your Enemies and get a Damage over Time on them. The Debuff stacks with every Meepo so you can slow down and Enemy to 100 MS.
AbilityTooltips.meepo_divided_we_stand: With every Level in Divided we Stand you get one extra Meepo. The Core Spell that makes Meepo to what he is. An Army of Many.
